messages.content: The election on 8th June is a straight choice of who you want to stand up for you in Parliament. I was elected as your MP on a promise of standing up for Stoke-on-Trent, getting the best deal for the Potteries and holding the Tories to account. As someone who has been loyal to Labour in the past, I want to thank you and let you know that if you vote for me on the 8th June, I will be loyal to you as your Labour MP. Stoke-on-Trent faces many challenges over the next few years, none more so than making sure we get the Brexit deal we need here rather than getting the scraps from any deals made for London.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: My priority is to make sure that Brexit works for our families and works for the Potteries.
Protecting our public services and making sure that our schools, our military, our police, our hospitals and vulnerable people in our society get the help and support they need.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing in NHS, Schools, Police, and Military
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Put more money into our NHS, our schools, our police and our military.
Address crisis in housing, increase police officers, and restore military size.

issues.brexitEurope: My priority is to make sure that Brexit works for our families and works for the Potteries. Britain is now leaving the European Union. The people of Stoke-on-Trent have made their voice heard loud and clear and I respect the outcome of that referendum.
issues.defence: We've seen what the Conservatives want to do to our country and our city. They want to axe winter fuel payments for pensioners. They want to take hot school lunches away from thousands of children and they want to see our NHS carved up and sold off to the highest bidder. After 7 years of Tory Government, our military has been cut to its smallest it has ever been in peace time.
issues.education: They want to take hot school lunches away from thousands of children.
issues.health: They want to see our NHS carved up and sold off to the highest bidder. NHS spending, targets, reform.
issues.socialWelfare: They want to axe winter fuel payments for pensioners.

contactInformation.address: Hillcrest House, Garth Street, Stoke-on-Trent, ST1 2AB

examples: After 7 years of Tory Government, we already have a crisis in housing, 15000 fewer police officers and our military has been cut to its smallest it has ever been in peace time.
The Tories have made the wrong choices for our country and our families.
This would be put at risk by voting for either the Tories or for UKIP.
Getting the best deal for the Potteries
making sure we get the Brexit deal we need here rather than getting the scraps from any deals made for London.
After 7 years of Tory Government, we already have a crisis in housing, 15000 fewer police officers and our military has been cut to its smallest it has ever been in peace time.
The Tories have made the wrong choices for our country and our families.

personalStories.story: Standing up for Stoke-on-Trent, getting the best deal for the Potteries and holding the Tories to account.

examples: Stoke-on-Trent faces many challenges over the next few years, none more so than making sure we get the Brexit deal we need here rather than getting the scraps from any deals made for London.
After 7 years of Tory Government, we already have a crisis in housing, 15000 fewer police officers and our military has been cut to its smallest it has ever been in peace time.
They want to axe winter fuel payments for pensioners. They want to take hot school lunches away from thousands of children and they want to see our NHS carved up and sold off to the highest bidder.
